sentences.en: A person downloads software to a phone and attaches a plastic eyepiece over the screen.
sentences.cn: 一个人将软件下载到手机上，并在屏幕上方附上塑料目镜。

sentences.en: A small magnifying glass usually set in an eyepiece and used chiefly by watchmakers and jewelers.
sentences.cn: '高倍'.''放大镜通常放在目''.'镜'. ''中的放大镜,形状小主要供珠宝商和钟表商使用.

sentences.en: After focusing, slip the viewfinder cap attached to the strap over the viewfinder eyepiece as necessary.
sentences.cn: 对焦后, 必须将背带上的目镜盖插入取景器目镜上.

sentences.en: Does this extend to the edge of our eyepiece or camera field of view?
sentences.cn: 会延伸到目镜的边缘或者是像机的视场内 么 ?

sentences.en: Draw the eyepiece towards you and the object will come into sharp focus.
sentences.cn: 你把目镜凑近些,物体就会变得特别清晰.

sentences.en: Essentially, the field stop of the eyepiece encompasses a linear field of view from the telescope.
sentences.cn: 从本质上讲, 目镜的视场光阑与望远镜有线性关系.

sentences.en: I say approximately because distortion at the edge of the an eyepiece changes this relationship somewhat.
sentences.cn: 说近似,是因为边缘变形改变了这种线性关系.

sentences.en: If the screen is away from the eyepiece that the camera can be placed between.
sentences.cn: 如果投影屏距目镜很远,照相机可放在两者之间.

sentences.en: Looking through the eyepiece you will see two black circles.
sentences.cn: 透过目镜你可以看到两个黑色的圆环.

sentences.en: Power, or magnification, of a telescope is actually the ratio between two independent optical systems – (1) the telescope itself, and (2) the eyepiece (ocular) you are using.
sentences.cn: 望远镜的放大倍数其实就是两个独立的光学系统的比值-(1)望远镜本身(2)以及所使用的目镜。

sentences.en: The method I developed requires no eyepiece and no control of the RA axis movement.
sentences.cn: 小弟开发的方法， 不需要接目镜， 也不用可以控制赤经轴的移动。

sentences.en: The result is an exit pupil that stays where the eyepiece designer intended.
sentences.cn: 其结果是出瞳说,停留的地方目镜设计者的原意.

sentences.en: The simple negative element Barlow increases eyepiece eye - relief.
sentences.cn: 简单的消极因素巴卢增加目镜眼救济.

sentences.en: The star test is lightning - fast and requires only a good high - power eyepiece.
sentences.cn: 光轴矫正是快速的并且要求需要高倍数的目镜.

sentences.en: The user looks into the eyepiece and uses the buttons on the phone to move two lines until they appear as one.
sentences.cn: 使用者通过目镜观察，并使用手机上的按键移动屏幕上的两条直线，直到它们重叠到一起。

sentences.en: The viewfinder eyepiece has a built - in –1 correction lens ( suitable for normal vision ).
sentences.cn: 取景器的目镜是一片-1的矫正镜片 ( 适合大多数普通视力 ).

sentences.en: This is the size of the field our eye sees when looking into the eyepiece.
sentences.cn: 就是我们透过目镜可以看到的区域范围.

trans.tran_en: the glass piece that you look through in a microscope or telescope
